content: Shopping mall in Jurong East, Singapore **Westgate** is a lifestyle and family [shopping mall](/wiki/Shopping_mall) in [Jurong East](/wiki/Jurong_East), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It is located close to [Jurong East MRT station](/wiki/Jurong_East_MRT_station) and [Jurong East Bus Interchange](/wiki/Jurong_East_Bus_Interchange). It is also connected with another shopping mall called [Jem](/wiki/Jem,_Singapore), and the [Ng Teng Fong General Hospital](/wiki/Ng_Teng_Fong_General_Hospital). ## Background Located at the heart of [Jurong](/wiki/Jurong) Gateway, the integrated retail and office development compromises of a 7-level lifestyle and family shopping mall and a 20-level office tower known as Westgate Tower. An [Isetan Supermarket](/wiki/Isetan) was located at Basement 2, the lowest level in Westgate. It closed on 8 March 2020. There is also the Westgate Wonderland on Level 4 that consists of a gym, [Fitness First](/wiki/Fitness_First), a swimming pool and a childcare centre called Kids Club at Level 5. On 23 May 2021, the mall, along with neighboring [Jem](/wiki/Jem,_Singapore) was closed for 2 weeks to 5 June due to [COVID-19](/wiki/COVID-19_pandemic_in_Singapore) after it was discovered that a cluster had emerged in those malls. - Official website This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Westgate, Singapore
